trans-unit.source: Represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'ambiente transazionale dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione sul thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> rappresenta l'ambiente transazionale dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione sul thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> has two properties: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property, which exposes the current work batch and allows a host or a host service to participate in the current transaction by adding <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> items to this property; and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property, which exposes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running on this thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment> ha due proprietà: la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> che espone il batch di lavoro corrente e consente a un host o un servizio host di partecipare alla transazione corrente aggiungendo elementi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> a questa proprietà; e la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> che espone il <xref:System.Guid> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro attualmente in esecuzione su questo thread.
Ottiene il batch di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch" /> that represents the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch" /> che rappresenta il batch di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property allows hosts or host services to participate in the current transaction by adding pending work items to the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> consente agli host o ai servizi host di partecipare alla transazione corrente aggiungendo elementi di lavoro in sospeso al batch di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: A host or a host service that wants to participate in the current transaction must implement the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface and use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to add pending work items to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Un host o un servizio host che desideri partecipare alla transazione corrente deve implementare l'interfaccia <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> e utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per aggiungere elementi di lavoro in sospeso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Durable services should add items to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> to keep the state of their data stores consistent with the state of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: I servizi durevoli devono aggiungere elementi a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> per mantenere la coerenza tra lo stato degli archivi dati con lo stato dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box durable services, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, both implement this functionality.
trans-unit.target: I servizi durevoli predefiniti, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> implementano entrambi questa funzionalità.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the workflow instance associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro associata al thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the current workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> che identifica l'istanza del flusso di lavoro corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> contains the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running in this thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> contiene il <xref:System.Guid> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro attualmente in esecuzione in questo thread.

trans-unit.source: Whenever code is run from within a workflow thread, you can get the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance through the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ogni qualvolta il codice viene eseguito dall'interno di un thread del flusso di lavoro, è possibile ottenere il <xref:System.Guid> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro tramite la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your code is in a service called by an activity, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> will provide <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for the calling activity.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il codice è incluso in un servizio chiamato da un'attività, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> fornirà il <xref:System.Guid> dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro per l'attività chiamante.
